cinvestav.android.pki.db.controller
Class CertificateController

java.lang.Object
  cinvestav.android.pki.db.controller.CertificateController

public class CertificateController
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements all the methods for accessing the Data Base layer classes, it should be the connection between the view layer an the database layer for retrieve and modify certificate information

Since:
30/07/2012
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ing. Javier Silva PÃ©rez - [javier]

getBySerialNumber

public CertificateDAO getBySerialNumber(java.lang.Integer serialNumber)
                                 throws DBException
Gets the certificate DAO from the data base using the certificate serial number as filter

Parameters:
serialNumber - Serial Number which will be searched
Returns:
a CertificateDAO object filled with the certificate information, corresponding to the asked serial number, if no coincidence is found in the data base an empty CertificateDAO object (id = 0) will be returned
Throws:
DBException - If something goes wrong during the SQL statement Execution

Parameters:
id - DataBase certificate Id which will be searched
Returns:
a CertificateDAO object filled with the certificate information, corresponding to the asked id, if no coincidence is found in the data base an empty CertificateDAO object (id = 0) will be returned
Throws:
DBException - If something goes wrong during the SQL statement Execution

public java.util.List<CertificateDAO> getByOwnerId(java.lang.Integer ownerId)
                                            throws DBException
Gets a list of the certificates that belongs to the desired subjectId

Parameters:
ownerId - Subject Id that must be search for
Returns:
A List of CertificateDAO filled with the certificates that belong to the asked subject Id in the data base, if no coincidences are found, an empty list will be returned
Throws:
DBException - If something goes wrong during the SQL statement Execution

Parameters:
caSubjectId - Subject Id of the CA of which the issued certificates list are desired
Returns:
A List of CertificateDAO filled with the certificates that belong to the asked CA's subject Id in the data base, if no coincidences are found, an empty list will be returned
Throws:
DBException - If something goes wrong during the SQL statement Execution

getByStatus

public java.util.List<CertificateDAO> getByStatus(java.lang.Integer status)
                                           throws DBException
Gets a list of the certificates with the desired db status

Parameters:
status - DataBase certificate Status which will be searched, Status of the certificate in the DB, the possible values are at X509UtilsDictionary ej. X509UtilsDictionary.X509_CERTIFICATE_STATUS_VALID
Returns:
A List of CertificateDAO filled with the certificates that belong to the asked CA's certificate serial number in the data base, if no coincidences are found, an empty list will be returned
Throws:
DBException - If something goes wrong during the SQL statement Execution

                                      throws DBException

Returns:
A list of certificates
Throws:
DBException - If something goes wrong during the SQL statement Execution

getByAdvancedFilter

public java.util.List<CertificateDAO> getByAdvancedFilter(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> filter)
                                                   throws DBException
Gets a list of certificates that were founded using the specified filter

Parameters:
filter - It's a Map which has the following structure:
  • Key = Tag of the filter to be used, should be define in DataBaseDictionary, this tags must be written as a SQL WHERE clause using PreparedStament form for example: 'DBfield = ?' or 'DBfield LIKE ?'
  • Value = Must be a string array of 2 positions where:
    • [0] = Value to be searched in the data base
    • [1] = Data type, according to this, the PreparedStatemen will be constructed, the valid DataTypes are defined in the DataBaseDictionary (e.g DataBaseDictionary.FILTER_TYPE_TABLENAME_FIELDNAME)
Returns:
A list of certificates that agrees with the filter
Throws:
DBException - If something goes wrong during the SQL statement Execution

getCertificateDetails

public void getCertificateDetails(CertificateDAO certificate)
Adds to the certificate the information about its owner and CA certificate

Parameters:
certificate - Certificate to which will be added the information, also the Id of this certificate will be used as SQL filter

getCurrentSerialNumberForCA

public java.lang.Integer getCurrentSerialNumberForCA(java.lang.Integer caSubjectId)
Get the current serial number for the CA

Parameters:
caSubjectId - CA subject Id of which the serial number is required
Returns:
the current serial number corresponding to the selected CA
